h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Get the Turtle Tear Soak from the Turtle General on the North Shore of the Bitter Lake.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Shell and Scales'.
The content is as follows:
**Get the Turtle Tear Soak from the Turtle General on the North Shore of the Bitter Lake.**
